snippet.title: [Rivals of Aether] Speedrunner Mario release trailer
snippet.description:
The Speed Demon is finally out! After 10+ months in development, hopefully it was worth the wait!
This wouldn't have been possible without Giik, Danilo-PJ, Fire and the rest of the RoA discord servers.

Download link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2190448871

Credits: 
TerminalMontage                       - Oringial "Speedrunner Mario" Idea.
IFerPe a.k.a me                          - Speedrunner Mario's Sprites.
Giik, Fire and Danilo-PJ            - Coding.
The Spriter's Resource            - Mario 64's font.
The Sounds Resource             - Sounds.
This trailer's song                     - Siivagunner.
YG123, N10, the folks at his beta test server     - Beta Testing.
D The Hedgehog                     - Character Reveal Template.
Fudgepop01                         - Creator of RoABox (A hitbox helper tool).
Mama Wooloo and waffles_ns          - For helping with the alternate colors.
The Rivals of Aether Discord        - For helping with a lot of other stuff in general :).

Shoutouts to Simpleflips
